ModMetaData.name: Clutter
ModMetaData.author: Mrowka
ModMetaData.description: Adds various stuff to clutter your base and make the game a bit more enjoyable, for colonists :D Most stuff have some kind of function other than having extra beauty and not letting your colonist go insane each time they see a dead squieerl. Spam here "https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=2541.0" if you have any problems or suggestions
